core:description.text: A graceful stemmed glass holding wine the color of a summer sunset. The blush-pink liquid has a delicate translucence, and the aroma suggests sun-warmed strawberries and fresh rose petals.

containers-core:liquid_container.flavorText: Light and refreshing, the wine glides across the palate with flavors of wild strawberry, watermelon, and a hint of citrus blossom. It finishes bright and clean, perfect for a warm evening.
